description:
This fantastic car children's game contains three beautiful and high-quality car & truck vehicles games for children aged 2 to 8 years.
All washing cargames can be played and tested for free. If the cars, actions and washing bath functions please your child, then the individual games can be activated with all functions from the fantastic vehicles kidgames app.
The kid carwash games are of high quality and designed by known illustrators. There are also a lot of funny farm animals and wild animals included.
Perfect for toddlers, kids, first and second graders and kindergarten preschool children. Lots of actions and cleaning mechanic tools for tires and car parts included. Great animations, effects and sounds.
This children car shower bath game has been designed for both boys and girls and offers a variety of cleanable family cars, trucks and all kind of different vehicles. Among them are normal cars, trucks, vans, buses, but also excavators, tractors, police cars, fire engines and a UFO including a funny alien.
Pop balloons and bubbles while you use the soap to clean your cars. Find bacteria and evil viruses with the magnifying glass.
The featured cars are also include funny farm animals or exotic wild animals and a safari truck. Perfect for kids, toddlers and preschool kindergarten kids.
Drive your cars and trucks and other vehicles to the laundry mechanic garage and use the cleaning service to clean all cars with a variety of foam and washing tools. Start the engine, use the gas station, then clean the vehicles of the dirt with the help of sponge, wash, foam, hair dryer, underbody washing, repair the mechanics, burst soap bubbles, dry the cars and construction vehicles and drive them out of the car wash.
The perfect toddler educational preschool RPG Kids Car Service with car repair, lots of auto workshop, workshop action for boys and girls too. Cool water physics in the vehicles service. Train your car games skills as a mechanic. Make your customers happy in your own gas station, garage and doctor car wash! Please the all-round service with the doctor mechanic package. Search for dangerous car bacteria and catch them in a search game. Bath your cars and catch fish. Even a dragon is in the game. Oil change is a must and the confetti bath is included! Catch balloons and soap bubbles. There is also a family Balloon popper and Bubble Popping feature included! You can use your finger to pop bubbles, balloons and catch bacteria.
Collect rewards in the form of stars and use them to use unique dirt effects. Dreckspatz alert!
Research your own detergent in your lab! Water physics fun guaranteed! Watch the helicopter and the alien spaceship. The horses and animals in nature.
Keep the unique cars, construction sites vehicles and their engine healthy. Play car games Auto Doctor and heal all typical auto diseases by using the many unique washing tools and perfecting their use. Take on the role of a garage mechanic and take care of a multitude of beautifully designed cars in their garages and their owners.
The toddler education game makes children happy and they like to deal with the subject of automobiles and vehicles.
If you like our new educational children preschool fun carwash learning educational game, please rate it here in the store and tell your friends and family about Car Wash Garage Games - For Kids.
For kids and car games support, please contact us: support@mcpeppergames.com
Have fun playing Car Wash Garage Games - For Kids!
Your McPeppergames team
